requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i3/AMD A8
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated/APU
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel i5/AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU - 2018 or Later
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

results.name: The Last Seed (Unnamed Collection, marcagotchi, elcoms)
